segments.text: What was the party like last night , Jean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad at all , thanks . There were one or two interesting people there.Why couldn't you come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I couldn't get away from work early . And when . I got home I had a headache , so I had to go straight to bed . But I was over-tired , because I wasn't able to get to sleep for hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a shame . Why didn't you take a sleeping pill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like them . I used to take them when I had to work overtime , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many did you use to take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good heavens . Why did you take so many ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I was under a terrible strain . The doctor saidthey weren't very strong . Anyway , I used to feel awful the next morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The doctor said I had to be careful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I stopped drinking coffee late at night instead .
segments.speaker: S1
